articles.author: Jordan Vandenberge, Camryn Justice
articles.title: Local small businesses left in limbo after issues with Paycheck Protection Program - News 5 Cleveland
articles.description: Many small businesses across the state found solace in the creation of the Paycheck Protection Program, but that promising program has left small business owners hanging in limbo, dealing with the complications still left unsolved by officials.
